segments.text: What a messy kitchen this is turning into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and floor, gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even notice her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate while chaos brews behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, sneaking cookies like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is unstable, but they're ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies falling potentially into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, so eager for the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside makes the interior look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this disregard for cleanliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just sloppy.
segments.speaker: PAR
